name: Movies & Series Diary Notion Template
description: Organize and track your favorite movies and TV series with ease using this comprehensive Notion template!Features: Track Movies: You can easily add new movies, categorize them by genre, rate them, and even leave personal reviews. Track TV Shows: Keep track of the seasons and episodes you've completed, rate each show, and add your own notes to remember those exciting plot twists. features: Track Movies:You can easily add new movies, categorize them by genre, rate them, and even leave personal reviews.; Episode Progress: Track your progress for each TV series and never lose your place. Mark the episodes you've watched, and easily pick up where you left off.; Custom Lists:Tailor your movie and TV series tracking experience to suit your unique preferences. This template enables you to create custom lists.; Purchase the template.; Duplicate the template in your Notion workspace.; Start tracking your movies and TV shows!
